heading: This Evening
text: Partly cloudy. Highs from the low 70s north to near 80 in the south. Winds becoming northwest at 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Sunday Night
text: Partly cloudy, Fog develops in the river valleys. Lows in the upper 40s to mid 50s, low to mid 40s in the cold spots. Calm wind.

heading: Monday
text: Mostly sunny. Highs from the upper 60s to low 70s, mid 70s to near 80 in the warmer valleys. Light wind.
